title: The Metaverse Explained
itunes:title: The Metaverse Explained
description: In this episode of the User Friendly podcast, host Hanish Patel is joined by Mic Locker, US Telecom, Media & Entertainment sector leader for Deloitte Consulting, to explore the many different facets of the metaverse and its applications. They also discuss the opportunities, challenges, and future of the metaverse for TMT companies, the tech sector, the creator economy, and more.
